categories: Category:The Official Star Wars Fact File

nodes.text: The Official Star Wars Fact File 4

The Official Star Wars Fact File 4 was the fourth issue of The Official Star Wars Fact File, released on January 23, 2002. The issue was authored by Darren Allanson, Chris Gardner, Iain Lowson and Jim Swallow. It also contained original illustrations by Carl Lyons.
The IG-88 Assasin Droid article includes original artwork by Carl Lyons.
